website_summaries.verdict: A great pack of round neodymium magnets that can be used to hold small items on metal surfaces.
pros: Magnet surface is coated to resist corrosion and rust so the neodymium can be used outside or in wet places
Coated with nickel and copper for durability
Can be screwed into place on nonmagnetic surfaces
cons: Magnets are not as strong as other brands of neodymium magnets

customer_reviews.title: The magnets strength and finish are good. If your counting on accurate dimensions however then ...
customer_reviews.text: The magnets strength and finish are good. If your counting on accurate dimensions however then know that the advertised dimensions are not what you are getting. Since neodymium magnets are generally priced by volume I docked two stars for false advertising of the size which is effectively skimming profits on their part. Diameter: Advertised 1.26", Actual 1.16" Thickness Advertised 0.20", Actual 0.18" These delta's seem small but end up being a reduction in total volume of about 20% The seller could had advertised these as the size they actually are for the same price and I still would have bought them and I would have been 5 star satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: InkJet

customer_reviews.title: These are "ONE SIDED" meaning the screw can only go in on one side, not a "set"
customer_reviews.text: For the strongest and ideal set-up you use two magnets, both screwed into each side of whatever you are trying to secure. This is IMPOSSIBLE with this particular set of magnets... they are all "+" on the countersunk side for the screw, meaning you cannot use two attracting magnets screwed into opposite surfaces - meaning basically, you can only use ONE magnet to a metal surface. This is different from the last set, that came in "pairs" or "sets" with opposing countersunk sides so you can "mate" them together on opposite surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: CactusJack

customer_reviews.title: Like um, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've many rare earth magnets, and use them for many purposes like holding my backyard gate open, holding items up in the rafters of the carport. I JB weld them onto my dewalt drills to hold bits or screws, so useful. This model is new to me with the counter sunk center hole. Working well and I will purchase them again. smile
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: These are impressive magnets! I am using one to keep track of screws during projects and thinking of other applications. I tried using them attached to a wall to hang a project board, but they weren't large enough. A slightly larger magnet with a better shape for the intended purpose, however is working beautifully. I may try these for hanging light weight pictures. I attach a piece of steel banding (available at home centers, just cut the amount you need with a hacksaw) to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson W. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I've had very strong 'rare earth' magnets for years and these are the real deal, almost freakishly strong and will pinch your fingers into blood blisters if you're not careful. The countersunk hole idea is brilliant, and the plated finish seems pretty tough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They hold pretty heavy tools!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the peg board in my workshop with these. Instead of tool holders falling off of the peg board every time I reach for pliers these magnets hold the tools in place conveniently and securely. Added benefit is screwdriver tips can be magnetized if you hang them by the tip.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: extremely powerful - warning
customer_reviews.text: extremely powerful - warning - watch your fingers - if you bring them together they easily break
customer_reviews.author: thetechguy

customer_reviews.title: really nice product powerful magnets I have a really small kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: really nice product powerful magnets I have a really small kitchen so I was looking for a solution to hang all my small jars and things under my cabinets I thought about the magnets but none of others had the hole in the middle to screw into anything and I’m not a glue guy So these magnets are really powerful nothing would drop and the hole and screws are very convenient
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than you think!
customer_reviews.text: Stronger than I thought! Decent size! Alot stronger than I thought they would be!
customer_reviews.author: ZAK

customer_reviews.title: Work Well, One Broke in Half
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how but one of the two packages had a broken one. Works well otherwise. I use different screws unless going into a solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: TEXPAT101

customer_reviews.title: Super-duper strong
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Screwed1/2 of them into wall, used other half to sandwich a large fabric wall hanging. It is invisible, secure, and best of all, if it gets pulled on by kids, pets or G'mom herself, it won't tear the fabric , harm the wall or bonk the person with a clunky bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jr Ranger

customer_reviews.title: A Sticky Connection
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these to install a interior seat panel in our van. The Velcro clips weren't strong enough to hold the panel in place, but these little guys are the same size, but with far better holding power.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, very strong magnets which are easy to mount for holding objects or for magnetic door latch, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright  nickle finish  and attraction strength is better than expected..powerful
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright nickle finish, Come with screws. Delivered with cushioning spacer. Attraction strength is better than expected...powerful.
customer_reviews.author: rkruz

customer_reviews.title: they will do
customer_reviews.text: They work fine but not as strong as the ones that I've been using of a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: HammerDown

customer_reviews.title: amazingly strong
customer_reviews.text: amazing magnets! super strong. only problem is I wanted to use two opposing so that the strength was greater but the counter-sink holes are all in the same polarity thus when using on a door and door frame for instance, the forces oppose each other unless you turn one of them around and then the screw head sticks out a little. but i would buy them over and over again because they work so well.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: These are brittle and shatter easily if allowed to rejoin too hard or out of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are brittle and shatter easily if allowed to rejoin too hard or out of alignment. I think they may work well if you mount them secure and use them for holding keys, tools, etc. I would not recommend them in a school or lab setting for experimentation.
customer_reviews.author: Skipp T.

customer_reviews.title: Strong little magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong...wish they would cite pounds or kilograms of strength...nice they included attachment screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very strong! Exactly what I wanted. Came in a nice clear plastic box.
customer_reviews.author: Cc clark

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for their size and I like the hole but the surface is a bit slick
customer_reviews.text: Powerful for their size and I like the hole but the surface is a bit slick. Wants to slide down for the application I need.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Small but very strong. Did the job that I have intended for it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet, Weak Design
customer_reviews.text: Worked out, I used them to mount sensors to my ceiling for a Oculus Rift and they are still there, at least the ones I was able to put up. On the other hand they are actually quite fagile and shatter easily.
customer_reviews.author: BuyingContraband

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of them were broken upon arrival. Very strong though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: but they snap in half pretty easy.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet, but they snap in half pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly weak magnet for size.
customer_reviews.text: Not a very strong magnet. I have small (1/5 the size of these) refrigerator magnets that are stronger than these.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Trigg

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Stronger than expected, I have gotten pinched a few times
customer_reviews.author: timothy g. woods

customer_reviews.title: These are super strong! Sadly they do need to be bolted
customer_reviews.text: These are super strong! Sadly they do need to be bolted. I bought them to hold some heavy items onto a metal safe, but even putting 4 of them on, they slide down the wall of the safe. The screws that came with them are only for wood, so I had to go out and buy metal nuts and bolts. Other than not working for my intended purpose, they have a very strong pull force.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Super strong handle with care!
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are extremely strong almost too strong. Magnets are difficult to separate. These are really industrial strength magnets. Be very careful when handling them.
customer_reviews.author: wreq

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described!
customer_reviews.text: These are only 1.16 inches, not 1.26 inches, will not work for my application. Doesn't matter what the description says, even with the "engineering diagram" in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Extremely brittle
customer_reviews.text: - extremely brittle, several broke apart when they rejoined. - NOT a matching pair, two magnets cannot be screwed to separate surfaces and still attract. - smaller then advertised. Unusable for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great strength, cracked in half
customer_reviews.text: Broke in half when I was trying to pull one of them apart but super strong magnetic power brittle product wouldn’t recommend because of how fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT 25mm!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for strong 1.00 diameter magnets and these popped up. They needed to be no larger than 1 inch to fit in a hole for a craft project I am working. They say they are 25mm but they are much larger. This delayed my project but hey, live and learn. They are very strong magnets but just too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pike

customer_reviews.title: They have strength and will break each other
customer_reviews.text: These break if you let them come back together to quickly. I've only broke 1 but they are soooo stong the just fly to each other. So id give a 5 star rating on stength and 2 for the breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and mighty
customer_reviews.text: This works really well and great for what we need it for. We use it for mounting devices under the counter and below the bed. We are glad we found these magnets because they do an awesome job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 10Pack Neodymium Disc Countersunk Hole Magnets, 1.26”D x 0.2” H Strong Permanent Rare Earth Magnets with 10 Screws
feature_bullets: VERY DURABLE - Coated with three layers of nickel, copper and nickel to reduce corrosion and provide a smooth finish which greatly increase the longevity of the Magnets.
POWERFUL MAGNETS - Each magnet can support 12kg pull vertically from the magnetic face when in flush contact with a mild steel surface
MAGNETS DIMENSIONS - 32mm diameter x 5mm thick with a 5mm diameter countersunk hole for fixing ,+/-0.1mm tolerance
DIY PROJECTS & SCIENCE EXPERIMENTS - Refrigerator Magnets, Shower Door, Work or Office, Scientific Purposes, Arts and Crafts or School Classroom.
QUALITY GUARANTEED - 100% MONEY-BACK Guarantee! The Highest Quality Available! 30 Days Money Back Guaranteed!
